channel.title: [PI] Server runner can't find main class: server.Server
channel.description: When I open my server runner it says this: [img]http://i563.photobucket.com/albums/ss75/belhelmiel/error.gif[/img] My run file says this: [code]@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code] The thing right before pause is [code]server.Server[/code] that should be the main class. So I don't see how it's not finding the main class. What would I change it to? I checked inside of server.java the name of the main class is Server. So it should be server.Server. Right? I'm really stressed out I just randomly got this error I didn't even change anything. I've been working on a server for a really long time then this happened. It ruined my day and I really need someone to help fix this or else all of my work is all for nothing. I've been working on this error all day long.

item.title: [PI] Server runner can't find main class: server.Server
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

The dumbasses don’t split the file correctly. They read each line, then split it. Which would work perfectly, except for the fact that when it reaches a line that’s just blank in the middle, it has an error.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Server runner can't find main class: server.Server
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:4, topic:414202”]you either have a empty string in item.cfg or prices.txt
or, you used spaces instead of tabs.[/quote]
OH MY GOD I LOVE YOU! YOUR A BEAST!!! I checked my prices.txt I put some enters on accident. I took em off and now it works!!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Server runner can't find main class: server.Server
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

Post what in itemhandler on those lines.

I’m not sure I think you mean these:

	public ItemHandler() {			
		for(int i = 0; i < Config.ITEM_LIMIT; i++) {
			ItemList[i] = null;
		}
		loadItemList("item.cfg");
		loadItemPrices("prices.txt");
	}

Right?
I modified some stuff inside of item.cfg and I modified some stuff in prices.txt but I put it back to normal because I didn’t wanna mess up my economy.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Server runner can't find main class: server.Server
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

When I open my server runner it says this:

My run file says this:

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
The thing right before pause is server.Server that should be the main class. So I don’t see how it’s not finding the main class. What would I change it to? I checked inside of server.java the name of the main class is Server. So it should be server.Server. Right? I’m really stressed out I just randomly got this error I didn’t even change anything. I’ve been working on a server for a really long time then this happened. It ruined my day and I really need someone to help fix this or else all of my work is all for nothing. I’ve been working on this error all day long.

Read full topic
